title: Hour 1: Gold Rusher?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Ryan Clark, and Marcus Spears react to the Panthers trading Christian McCaffrey to the San Francisco 49ers and debate if this move will make them the NFC favorite. Plus, did Kyler Murray and Kliff Kingsbury downplay their heated argument on the sidelines in last night's win? Monica McNutt and Kendrick Perkins join the show to discuss the latest on the Lakers, including if this season is heading towards disaster after an 0-2 start. With Dak Prescott set to return for the Cowboys' Week 7 matchup against the Lions, the crew debates if there's any added pressure on his performance after the success of his backup Cooper Rush.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Does the addition of Christian McCaffrey put the 49ers at the top of the NFC?
